Repository Name Unauthorized: Oviedo Historical Society at Lawton House
Notes: The T.W. Lawton House was built in 1890 in Oviedo and  became the official home of the Oviedo Historical Society in 2010. The Cracker-style architecture is typical for the grove houses of its time. Museum contains newspaper articles, photographs, tools, textiles, furniture, early household appliances and farm equipment used for citrus and celery crops.
